title: Feature Request: Folders for external tools | Hide tools from UI
author: ductnone
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Being able to organize external tools into folders | Hide tools from UI

## Current Behavior
As of now once a certain number of external tools is reached, they cannot be shown in the UI anymore and one needs to expand the UI using the arrow button. Also external tools are currently sorted in a pre-determined order that cannot be changed.
You cannot change the order based on utilization.
Also all external tools are shown on the UI.

comments.snippet: Thanks, yes, will think about in next branch
comments.author: Kvarkas
